TopicTitle: [1.0.5] [RELEASE 0.8] Sido's Urania System : 7 new planets and 8 moons !

Articles.Content: After installing this, I can't seem to hit resume game or start new game. I hit the button but it does nothing. Has anyone else had this bug?
OMG!!1 How do people make these things. I always wanted to make my own planet . but how do i do it?

Having an issue with the new contract feature. All the beginner contracts in Mission Control are now for Hestia instead of Kerbin. Is there an index number I need to change somewhere?

Edit: Looks like this is a PlanetFactory issue. Discussed here

I really enjoyed this mod so I hope so.
I've heard that this particular pack doesn't work with StarSystems. Is that true?

I love the planets in this mod but it is just too glitchy to play. =( There's the contracts bug, ok, but beyond that two of the planets collide with each other!, just pass right through each other... Haven't studied it closely but it really prevents me from doing much with this mod until the orbits are reasonable. Both of the intersecting planets are very interesting so I don't want to just delete one of them, which leaves me in a quandry. So yeah, the orbits need to be fixed and the contracts sorted out before I can seriously play the mod. I love Fragum and the other planets are pretty awesome too so I really want this to work. =(

Intersecting orbits are generally made in such a way the planets never crash into each other.. Those moons move at nearly the same speeds, neither will catch up to the other.

I've heard that this particular pack doesn't work with StarSystems. Is that true?

no, I put Urania around Dolas and it worked fine.

Wow taht was awesome and is that .24 ? How you got the clouds to work they won`t work for me. If you use a special config can you upload it to Dropbox or something ?

@ Learwin and Augustus I downloaded a cfg file posted by someone else on this mod post. Vararo said this! Thank him! Here it is;

1.Download and install EVE from http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...umetricClouds! as usual.

3. Download and install Urania as usual, STOP WHEN YOU GO TO COPY THE CLOUD DIRECTORY!

3. Open the Cloud Directory from the Uranaia Download.

4. Open the BoulderCo Directory in your GameData folder.

5. ONLY copy over the following files- erato_clouds, Hecate_clouds, hermes_clouds, hestia_clouds, hyperion_1, hyperion_2, rhea_clouds, snow.

6 Download this .cf file https://www.dropbox.com/sh/l5me0eyhz...ers-Urania.cfg

7.Place the coudlayer-Urania in your Clouds Directory.

8. ???

9. Profit!
